comments.body: `pos == 0` cannot happen for `IsInPlace()`? If so, please add an `Error` message to diagnose this case should it ever happen. If `pos == 0` just doesn't need to do anything (because source == target data?) then please add a small comment to help a lost soul having to review this code!
You can avoid checking for `pos != 0` twice if you use `if (pos == 0) { ... } else if(IsInPlace()) { ... } else { ... }`

I think that is not strictly equivalent.  The current scheme is
```
if (IsInPlace())
   if (pos != 0)
       something
   else
       nothing
else if (pos != 0)
   something else
else
   something else
```
